Articles.Content:
Alright. Well, I control hordes of minions that are attempting to destroy your headquarters. This first game will have 4 bases. HQ, Alpha, Beta, Charlie. Each player can control one squad, that needs to defend from the minions.

Attacks can do as much damage as you want, I will modify them if I think they are op. (1 day=1 turn, as I will be updating once per day). Each "horde" of minions have 1,000,000 health, and can do 50,000 damage to a base per turn. Each base has 10,000,000 health, while the HQ has 1,000,000 health. I can attack the HQ through any base I have destroyed. The HQ is secure until I defeat a base. Good luck.

HQ : SECURE

ALPHA : 10,000,000

BETA : 10,000,000

CHARLIE : 10,000,000

I am sending ten hordes to ALPHA. They will not do damage on their first turn attacking.

I don't really understand how this game works, but...

I have a squadron of B-2s with tactical nukes.
